# Jesse A. Eisenbalm

> Premium natural beeswax lip balm. The only business lip balm that keeps you human in an AI world.

## About
Jesse A. Eisenbalm is a premium lip balm brand featuring hand-numbered limited edition beeswax lip balm. Release 001. $8.99. All proceeds go to charity.

The brand philosophy centers on mindfulness and human connection in an increasingly AI-driven world, with the ritual: Stop. Breathe. Balm.

## Product
- Name: Jesse A. Eisenbalm - The Original
- Price: $8.99 USD
- Weight: 4.5g / 0.15 oz
- Formula: Natural beeswax
- Edition: Limited Edition Release 001, hand numbered
- Availability: In stock
- Shipping: Free shipping

## Key Features
- Premium beeswax formula
- All-day hydration
- Daily mindfulness ritual
- Limited edition, individually numbered
- All proceeds go to charity

## Journal (Blog)
The brand publishes essays and meditations on human connection, mindfulness, lip care rituals, and staying present in an AI-driven world.
- Journal: https://jesseaeisenbalm.com/blog
